CustomField.description: This value is synced with the Account. Before entering a value, please make sure that the Account is in the right segment (SMB/LCS). It cant be changed later.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value is synced with the Account. Before entering a value, please make sure that the Account is in the right segment (SMB/LCS). It cant be changed later.
CustomField.label: Company ID
